website_summaries.verdict: Keeps foods hot or cold for a long time and features 2 compartments.
pros: This bag includes a bottom compartment (16 x 11 x 4.2 inches) and an expandable upper compartment (16 x 11 x 3.2 inches) and can hold most 9 x 13 inch baking dishes
Includes an exterior zippered pocket and keeps foods hot and cold for several hours
cons: The hook and loop attachment for the handles can sometimes be crooked and cause the handles to be lopsided

customer_reviews.title: A Worthwhile Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermal carrier! I was not sure about the color when I bought it, but it really is very pretty. The functionality of this carrier is fabulous! I was able to put (2) 9" x13" aluminum pans in the bottom section - extended AND another pan of the same size in the top section. The hot pans were on the bottom and these containers remained hot - straight from the oven for the next 2 hours without warming the top dessert pan. I'm pleased with this purchase and look forward to using it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Javafox

customer_reviews.title: Defective/Poor handle design
customer_reviews.text: The padded Velcro handle was sewn on lopsided, causing the entire carrier to tilt. If it wasn't permanently affixed to the handle, this would be a quick fix, but now I need to return and wait for a non-defective product, which will arrive too late to be used for the dinner I purchased it for. Sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well--And Is Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful carrier. It kept my food warm for several hours. We cut a piece of cardboard covered with aluminum foil to fit on the bottom of the top compartment to make it a little stiffer when carrying two casseroles. You may not have to do that, but we did it just for peace of mind. Highly recommend this good looking, well made carrier. We had several people ask about it at our gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Diane MC

customer_reviews.title: Carrier good for portable meals
customer_reviews.text: Never expected to use it more than for carrying casseroles to Thanksgiving dinner, but I have used it to bring meals to my children. It is perfect for the lasagna sized foil pans, and it keeps them from bending. Two pans fit in the carrier and there is a pocket on top so you can put a utensil in if you need to. Would be good for a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: BDunk

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for the cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier specifically for thanksgiving since I had to travel about 3 hours with cold food. I bought two portable Pyrex hot & cold packs to put inside. They were still frozen solid after 6 hours! It worked great for the cold, still waiting to use for hot food.
customer_reviews.author: LCT1933

customer_reviews.title: A must! Make our night out on the water perfect for dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for a planned dinner on the river with my hubby. There was LOTS of room for two large dish and extra zipper department on top for spoons and napkins. We bought two of the LG heat packs. Kept our food nice and warm. Love the color!! A must!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Valdez

customer_reviews.title: who knew I transported so much food!
customer_reviews.text: Can fit the travel (disposable) pans with ease. The double pockets are so useful. Never ever realized how often I would use this. And if you only need to use one section the top is great to put the spoons/serving items/plates etc in. Pretty much if you have a kid / family / go to work / EVER need to attend a potluck / or visit your mother this thing will come in handy to haul food.
customer_reviews.author: Greendrgon

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this several times since purchase. It’s awesome. The top part expands so you have double the space if needed. It also has an outside zippered pocket that’s great for extra utensils etc. Both compartments are insulated & can hold a lot of weight. Worth every penny! Don’t buy the more expensive name brand ones. This one will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: katiegirl

customer_reviews.title: What!? You don't have yours yet?
customer_reviews.text: Room to spare in the bottom for Emile Henry 13x9x3 casserole dish (B00WRIITJM) and top will take a casserole dish that is only slightly smaller. It also has a section for utensils in the top flap that can be used when both compartments are in use. The reflective coating on the inside held up to macaroni and cheese fresh out of the oven for a thirty-minute trip to a potluck dinner. It also has zips to collapse it to take up less storage space when not in use. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: James Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold a homemade lasagne I planned to make for a family get-together. It fit the baking dish perfectly and kept the lasagne warm. I also appreciate the sturdiness and quality of it. I did not think about how heavy lasagne is when carried in a glass baking dish. The carrier kept everything balanced and made it easy to carry and travel with no-spill. Though I did not use the 2nd section for this get-together, I'd like to also point up that there was room to add silverware and napkins, or other small items for travel. It's the perfect carry-all for hot and cold meals.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Can Carry Both Hot & Cold Together!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier! Not only is it gorgeous, but it works great! I was a little skeptical about using one compartment for cold and one for hot, but I gave it a go. I used my Pampered Chef Large Cool & Serve Container on the bottom, it fit perfectly incase anyone is wondering and pull the baked beans right out of the oven and put them in the top compartment. The cool & serve on the bottom stayed cool and the beans stayed hot for about 2 hours I believe it was before I took them out. I love this carrier! I would highly recommend in. It’s made well and made beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Handy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Handy for one or two casseroles. It keeps everything warm. I haven’t tried anything chilled yet, but I assume it would work just as well. It’s cute, easy to carry, and I can collapse it to store just about anywhere in the pantry or kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: DESIREE JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dad was in rehab and we brought him food from home so he would agree to eat. The warmer worked great as we would bring a variety of hot food and eat with him for encouragement. Attractive and did keep the food warm from home to the center. Good value. Would recommend it especially for anyone else trying to get someone in recovery from hip replacement to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sister

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite things I have ever purchased! The coloring is so bright and fun, and it seems very well made. The inside of the casserole holder EASILY fits a 9x13 and the second compartment is great for putting another dish or utensils or condiments in. It kept my food very hot as I was traveling, and I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Paige H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, keeps food warm
customer_reviews.text: Used this with a couple of heated homemade rice bags to keep tortillas warm for a party. They were still warm after 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use?
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the compartments. Both easily accommodate 9x13 casseroles with lids. The materials are good quality except for one of the zippers. The lower zipper on the left side does not zip easily and requires several tugs to round the corner. The upper zipper and the right side of the lower zipper move with more ease. I followed the common sense suggestion not to put a dish straight from the oven into the carrier without a towel or hot pad beneath it. The carrier kept the food hot in transit. Overall pleased but the zipper reduced the rating by one star.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ It!
customer_reviews.text: I carried a cake topped with Cool Whip and strawberries for a distance of approx. 60 miles. It was an aluminum pan and had a thin, plastic top. Could have carried it further if needed. Arrived in perfect condition. Cake was still cold. Very easy to clean. Just wiped with a cloth on the inside. Had plenty of rom for 9” X 13” pan. Had plenty of room in bottom section of carrier even with raised dome on top. Impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Genie Prather

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality, roomy carrier with great features.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m on a committee that often takes dishes to church dinners. I had another carrier that only accommodated one 9X13 dish. It’s great that I can now carry two larger dishes and one can be hot and the other cold. It’s well made - the zippers and handles are sturdy. It maintains the temperature for at least two hours. I haven’t tried it longer than that. I needed a new one of these because zippers broke on my old one. I’m glad I found this. I highly recommend it!t
customer_reviews.author: C. Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and lots of toom.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times for both hot and cold dishes and it worked as promised. I like that you can carry it either horizontally or vertically, depending on what's inside. My largest casserole fit inside perfectly and although there was some spillage over a 2 hr. drive because it was only covered with foil, it cleaned up easily and held the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you should.
customer_reviews.text: I love this groovy thing. Read the description; that's exactly what it does, and does it well. And it's cool looking. It kept two 9 x 13 dishes hot for more than an hour while I begged the turkey to brown in my 1965 oven. Like so hot I had to use a mitt. Which I didn't realize until after I burned myself.
customer_reviews.author: TX Steph

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for two pot lucks coming up. So far, I love it! If that changes after I use it, I’ll be sure to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: gebbiabn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Really kept my cinnamon rolls & breakfast casserole hot when used with the Vesture Hot Pack for 2 hours. I also purchased a similar single casserole/insulated carrier from Bed Bath & Beyond. The product from BBB melted when i placed a warm (not hot) dish in it. Highly recommend the Mier insulated carrier—stylish and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A R

customer_reviews.title: Love the double layer that keeps food hot & cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the double layer that keeps food hot & cold at the same time. Pretty bag, easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: It LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Some liquid I came out of one of the dishes I was transporting and it leaked right out the bottom on to the cloth seat of my truck...so very disappointed in this product not to mention the fact I waited until 8:00 p.m. for it to arrive at my office when I get off work at 5, I know that isn't your issue but ordering on Prime and having to wait two days was awful
customer_reviews.author: Sue Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Great for church potluck carryall
customer_reviews.text: Like the rectangular size and the depth. Design fine. Works well. Wish it had a sturdier bottom but lined it with heavy cardboard covered with foil to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best secret Santa gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a gift and then someone regifted it back to us (awkward). I think it’s awesome. Nothing worse than slaving away on a dish all day just for it to get cold and mushy by the time you get to your destination. This carrier kept our dish warm. True to size and really cute colors. We will definitely buy more of these and it is probably going to be my go to secret Santa gift until the end of time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dee

customer_reviews.title: But it's great for carrying around big casserole dishes - great quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to carry my bento box, and it's WAAAAAY too big for that. But it's great for carrying around big casserole dishes - great quality, and I love that there are two separate temperature-maintaining sections.
customer_reviews.author: SummerLark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go with the larger size and couldn’t be happier! When it first arrived, I thought it was too large. However, upon realizing that it could accommodate a huge Costco chicken pot pie in the lower compartment and two side dishes in the top, along with a loaf of French bread and serving utensils, I was over joyed!!! Have used it many times and it is very versatile with the expandable top compartment, exceedingly durable, and a breeze to clean. Thermal ability seems on par with other similar items I’ve owned. I will enjoy the convenience of safely transporting a full hot meal for up to eight people for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent insulator. Well worth the purchase price
customer_reviews.text: This insulator is perfect!! It works well for both cold and hot items. I still use foil or a towel around the dish before placing in the insulator. It has kept food hot for about 4 hours, and very warm for longer than that. It works very well with cold food, and with an ice pack, they’ve remained cold for up to 8 hours. You do have to have all cold, or all hot dishes, though, as they don’t have great insulation between the two sections.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, easy to clean, looks good .
customer_reviews.text: We have had this only a very short time,but we used it a couple of days after got it. It worked well the dish used spilled inside, and nothing leaked outside. Was easy to clean, seemed to keep everything hot for the hour and a half to get where going.
customer_reviews.author: donald ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect for carrying food.
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier, I took it for Easter and it kept the food perfect and they were over an hour late getting dinner on the table. Not only is there a lot of room for casseroles and bowls it is beautiful and I got complimented on it by a couple of people. So happy with this purchase can’t wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Really holds onto the heat!
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas, and going to a dinner on Christmas day, decided to try it. Put a casserole from the oven in; it expanded nicely to hold it. Zipped up easily, handles on top held nicely. Drove in freezing temps with the holder on the floor, then set it on the counter at the party for the next 2 and a half hours. When it was time to serve, unzipped it, and was close to needing a pot holder to take it out! Wow, did it retain the heat! The food was steaming hot. So happy to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cann

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Used it 1st time on Thanksgiving and it worked wonderfully. I had 2 9x13 pans and 1 9x9 pan and it was great to not have to stack everything into a laundry basket with towels and drive to grandmas's house or in my case SIL's house. Feels pretty sturdy and kept things pretty warm. We did have to drive over an hour put items were oven cooled, but not hot.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Very practical & useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, lots of room, but not so much that your pan slides around inside. I just wish someone would make this type of material in better colors/patterns, lol.. It is made very well, very sturdy, and came quickly. If I ever need another, I will buy from this company again, but they make such a good product, I won't have to!!
customer_reviews.author: cari

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying hot or cold food!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for transporting hot or cold casserole dishes, with room to add hot or ice packs and even serving spoons & such! This thermal carrier collapses for easy storage, Is easy to clean & looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Harris

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible!! I have used it for many potlucks since I purchased it and it is such a great concept!! And beautiful to boot!! I get SO MANY compliments on the color and when people find out it holds 2 casseroles they are blown away! It’s the little things, people! LOL
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to take desserts to a party. Perfect. Kept everything cold, traveled well. Also bought two flat freezer packs to Sliger in compartments. Highly recommend this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Love this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carrier! I’ve looked for one for so long and finally decided on this one. I’m so glad I did. I bought this same one for my best friend. I just love mine. Everything I’ve put in it fits great. It keeps food hot/cold. Bought the Pyrex cooling/hot packs and use them with it. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay RN

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous casserole carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. I love the durability. I love the 2 sections. I use the bottom for the casserole or whatever I have made. I use the top for paper plates, napkins & utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Mother's Day gift for my daughter-in-law, but ended up using it myself to send dinner to a neighbor just home from the hospital. It held everything for the dinner plus a pumpkin pie--all hot from the oven. Now I'll have to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy_2u

customer_reviews.title: I love the INDIVIDUAL COMPARTMENTS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the dual compartments. So many that I saw when I was shopping had no separation. I love that these are divided, so there's no cross contamination of foods. My mac and cheese doesn't borrow flavor from my campfire beans! Two thumbs up. This is an amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jenngirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome casserole dish carrier! You can fit two 8x8s next to one another.
customer_reviews.author: H. Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Hot picnic food, yay!
customer_reviews.text: We eat out at parks frequently in the summer and although I have my standard go tos for room temperature meals, sometimes I want to bring my leftovers and keep them warm. This really works. I have now started grilling at home (instead of at the park) and putting hot packs in with the food. Hot dinners have been great.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this. I bought it for the holidays & it totally paid off! Holds three casseroles, as long as the covers aren't too tall. Kept my food nice & hot for approximately 2 hours. It might go longer, but that was as long as my longest trial. Looks super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: no_deadbeats

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Think I'll be pleased with this product. Not used both compartments yet but am happy that is an option. Keeps warm and is easy to transport and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: leeny

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: I took two hot casseroles-HEAVY dishes-in this tote for Christmas Dinner. They were still warm 4 hours late when dinner got delayed. The straps were not even strained by the weight. I highly recommend this tote!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sasek

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a double carrier with a cute patter at a reasonable price and I found it in thos product. The quality feels very nice and it works great transporting either one or two casserole dishes. This would for sure make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Strong and thick insulation.
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic buy, I am very happy with this insulated bag, the color orange is so beautiful, it's very strong and sturdy, I love it so much that i bought two of them, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I use it, had to get the pans for it, my granddaughter liked mine, so this is for her, got her better pans.
customer_reviews.author: LVANTEBLANC

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this too many times yet but I do like the size. It easily hold a 9 x 13 casserole dish.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Brader

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked by the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am so shocked by all the good reviews. i wanted to like this so much but after one trip i am so disappointing. a hot tray of food was down to room temperature in 2 hours. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rajdeep Guha

customer_reviews.title: Great casserole carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I need one for kids school potluck. Since I can’t stand Rachel Ray, I decided to try alternate brand. I used both compartments to carry two 9x13 pans of lasagna after resting them 10 minutes upon baking. I also used gel heat pack to keep them warm. I served lasagna about 1.5 hours later and they are still piping hot! I will be using this carrier for all the potluck from now one!
customer_reviews.author: ykk

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and sturdy. I cooked food and traveled an hour away and the insulation kept the food nice and warm. I like that it has several compartments for food storage.
customer_reviews.author: MZ02

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, good price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, just what I needed for dinner parties as I am often taking foods from my place to others.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Mcrae

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm casseroles
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I was worried my casserole dish wouldn't fit; it's a 13x9 Pyrex but has large handles, making it nearly 17 in. It was snug, but it fit. The top can also be zipped down and compressed if you only have one dish to carry. I've only used it twice, but so far, it's been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rootfield

customer_reviews.title: I help feed the crew of the Wisconsin Rovers each ...
customer_reviews.text: I help feed the crew of the Wisconsin Rovers each summer when they come to our part of the state to build foot bridges and boardwalk for the Noth Country TRail and this will sure come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bethany Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!! Very durable!! Even takes dishes right out of the oven (just lay down a towel first)! Holds two large lasagna size casserole dishes. You can put 4 square 8x8 pans also. Convenient zipper container for extras( serving utensils). The carrying straps are very durable!!! Super impressed!!! Also, the color is bright and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hot really well. Also love that I can carry hot and cold items in separate chambers. Easy to carry. Would prefer different color, but this was the only choice at the time. A definite must have item for pot lucks.
customer_reviews.author: bellavita

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The Mier double casserole carrier worked out great for a long weekend get away. I had a casserole and a cake to bring for a potluck and was able to carry them comfortably to the potluck that was about a 2 block walk. Two 9x13 dishes fit perfectly and it has a nice side pocket to carry serving spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier ever for casserole dishes
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and exactly what I was looking for! Not only is it a really cute print, but I love that I can put 2 casserole dishes or just 1 in there to take somewhere. I have traveled 2 hours with these and it has kept them cold with ice packs. I absolutely love it and so glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Beehive1

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I just got mine and used it to bring food to an event. I fit in two 9x13 casserole dishes and a smaller rectangle casserole dish as well!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: There’s a lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s going to be great for making dinners for my daughter and her family and sending them home with her
customer_reviews.author: Lola M. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Whats for lunch?
customer_reviews.text: I got the green and I love it. Very cute and will hold a lot of food. This would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Bevis

customer_reviews.title: Fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works well when I was working. I dont go to pot lucks anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Large enough to hold large pans. Very sturdy. Love the pattern. Really like that it has big compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Dariana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom and she was thrilled! It’s great quality and the colors are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Really held the heat
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would keep my food hot and secure. This worked perfectly. I used it during the 2019 holiday season and wished I had bought it long ago! My food arrived, after a 30 minute drive, hot and secure. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lovnco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow, much nicer than expected. Even found a compartment on top for utensils!
customer_reviews.author: Jade-Loe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually bigger than I expected. With a sturdy metal lid on Pyrex casserole, I am able to stack two in the bottom and one on the top, and still close the zippers easily!! It carries three! Plenty of room, and it appears well-constructed. I love it when things come as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took this on the airplane!!
customer_reviews.text: I filled this up with homemade baked goods and froze them and transported them through the airport and on the airplace. Worked like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Mire insulated carrier
customer_reviews.text: This insulated carrier is awesome. It keeps good really hot. I have used it four times in the first month.
customer_reviews.author: susan zuber

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: beautiful colors! the handle is fine and definitely roomie enough. can fit 2 9x12 pans
customer_reviews.author: Elle913

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Used for traveling to a Thanksgiving dinner, it kept everything hot. Both bottom and top. People thought it was a 31 product, nope bought on Amazon at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Just us

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Plenty of room and very easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great casserole carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! Perfect for the holidays or work pot lucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, cute material & just as described. Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: jpogle

customer_reviews.title: Would make a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product. Can use it often. I didn’t know if the food coming out of oven could be put in carrier. I let it cool some and put towels around it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great insulated bag for carrying hot foods. Nice handle and very roomy !
customer_reviews.author: Roman Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: great product and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I had one cold dish and one hot dish to take to a family gathering. This worked GREAT! Very durable zippers and handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casserole holder!
customer_reviews.text: I literally cant wait to put this bad boy to use Thanksgiving day!!! It is so cute, and also its alot larger than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very rich looking tote
customer_reviews.text: Very nice carrying case. It looks very expensive. My daughter-in-law loved it!
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carrier. It will carry a 10 x 13 size pan snuggly. Keeps things very hot! Having the option to carry to pans at the same time is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I just rec’d The product and it is not as pictured. I’m disappointed. Had I known, I would have ordered something else!
customer_reviews.author: Woj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use this when we go on car trips. Put our lunch and snacks. Everything stays cold. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how well this works. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this works. I put a casserole in the carrier right out of the oven. It was still hot and ready to eat almost 4 hours later. You can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grant

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works, so happy. Kept my desserts chilled with ice packs. Kept my stew hot with heat pack. So easy to carry. Love
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful termal food tote
customer_reviews.text: I love this colorful thermal tote! I have not used it yet, but I think it will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: pamelanovak

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for thanksgiving and the food was stil hot and it was so easy to pack and carry!!! I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Byerley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item, used it this past week for a carry in at work and was able to carry both a warm dish and cool desert and had absolutely no problem keeping the hot, hot and the cold, cold.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good for casseroles.
customer_reviews.text: Great for casserole, but not tall enough for a fully filled apple pie.
customer_reviews.author: Bc4rr011

customer_reviews.title: Love this carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for Thanksgiving. Kept my casseroles warm for the trip to my brother in laws house. Well made. Will buy some for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mckern

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take 2 casseroles to a work dinner. The casseroles were in the carrier for 4 - 5 hours between taking them out of the oven and being served. They were STILL HOT!
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: She said it is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She said it is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and roomy
customer_reviews.text: this carrier is awesome and so roomy. I also purchased the Pyrex Hot and Colk Pack Combo to use with it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hammond

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and wish I had bought this a while back!

customer_reviews.title: A quality carrier that zips easily and fits large dishes
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is very large...easily accommodates a 9 x 13 casserole with lid and handles.

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, and exactly what I was looking
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice looking, and exactly what I was looking for

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Just what my wife had needed to take a casserole to her parents home each week. She is happy that it allows her to carry the dish while still warm and it handles easily. Also folds easily for storage after use.
customer_reviews.author: The Cool Dad

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom, it's very nice for the money. Perfect for multiple dishes!

customer_reviews.title: Big bag
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it keeps me from carrying a lot of bags to work.

product_meta.title: MIER Insulated Double Casserole Carrier Thermal Lunch Tote for Potluck Parties, Picnic, Beach, Fits 9 x 13 Inches Casserole Dish, Expandable, Green
feature_bullets: Double Casserole Carrier---- MIER expandable lunch bag has 2 large compartments; Expandable upper compartment exterior size: 16L x 11W x 3.2H inch, Bottom compartment exterior size: 16L x 11W x 4.2H inch, accommodate most 9" x 13" baking dishes (dished not included)

Ultra performance cool bag technology---- The interior lining with food-grade aluminum foil and filled with 8mm foam to keep your food cold or warm for longer. In the expandable carrier, you can put a hot item in one layer and a cold item in the other layer and will the items stay hot and cold respectively

Makes Your Life Easier---- A large exterior zippered pocket is great for carrying accessories like cutlery, napkins or BBQ tongs and two handles with padded wrap allow for easy transport. IMPORTANT INFO: Famous brand zipper "SBS" be used for this lunch bag, which is more smooth and durable than normal zipper
Vibrant Color Party Bag---- Perfect for taking food to friends house, a large family heading out for a picnic, camping, beach, potluck or for the holidays party etc

Limited Manufacturer's Warranty---- TWO-YEAR for MIER Double Casserole Carrier Lunch Tote. We stand behind our products. If a product fails because of a defect in material or the quality of workmanship, we will repair or replace it free of charge. MIER takes pride in the quality of our products and warrants that the materials and workmanship will be free of any defects. Our factories follow a strict set of specifications and quality standards, however, if a problem develops, please contact us
